VERIFING_SUBTITLE: Complete CAPTCHA below to join the group chat.
PASSED_DESC:
You can find the group chat you just joined in chat list.
If you cannot see it, try restart your Telegram client.
ERROR_DESC:
There is an error: {errmsg}
Please re-apply to the group and try again.
ERRCODE_CAPTCHA_NOT_PASSED: your CAPTCHA had not be passed
LANGUAGE_TEST: You are now using English language environment.
FOOTER:
The bot only provides public human verification and anti-spam information services.
The development community does not directly organize corresponding group chats, nor does it directly endorse or represent responsibility for their topics, views, or services.
FALLBACK_LOGIN_NOTICE: 請先使用 Telegram 帳戶登錄
FALLBACK_USER_MISMATCH: 錯誤：登錄的用戶與驗證請求不匹配。請使用正確的 Telegram 帳戶。
FALLBACK_SUCCESS: 驗證成功！您現在可以關閉此頁面並返回 Telegram。
